programme.title: El Regreso Del 24
programme.desc: After beign left for dead, El 24 survives and goes back to his drug-dealing business. But the relatives of his former enemy are ready to get revenge and put a price to his head.

programme.title: En Las Garras De La Bestia
programme.desc: A woman decides to leave Tijuana, where life can be difficult for some people, after being harassed by a neighbor, and she tries to reach the United States in search of a new life.

programme.title: Madres Michoacanas
programme.desc: When criminals take Michoacan, the women of the town fear for their children, who could be drafted by the new mafia.

programme.title: 90210 Shark Attack
programme.desc: Oceanography students at a Malibu mansion fall prey to a mysterious entity that leaves wounds similar to a shark attack.

programme.title: 666 Devilish Charm
programme.desc: When a cursed devil's charm' bracelet shows up at a sorority house on Valentine's Day, each girl tries to make a series of wishes, and each finds that unintended consequences are the primary purpose of Satan's sinister strategy.

programme.title: Obstaculos: Orgullo Y Recompensa
programme.desc: The rural and borderline town of Culebra becomes the crossroads between characters of all walks of life. There, “gringos” policemen, assassins on the run, hitmen looking for their mark and more cross their paths and live, kill or die for their pride or a bounty.

programme.title: Deportados
programme.desc: A portrait of people humiliated and exploited by Americans and even by their own latino racemen, after they succesfully cross the border into the US.

programme.title: Combativo
programme.desc: Commando Ali Ex best man of anti-terrorist force takes on a daring mission to eliminate the dreaded Rustam group and its network of ruthless mercenaries in this most entertaining and hard-hitting Actioner.

programme.title: Bigfoot Vs. D.B. Cooper
programme.desc: When several young hunters arrive at a secluded lodge in the Pacific Northwest little do they know that they will become the hunted.

programme.title: 1962: Halloween Massacre
programme.desc: In 1969, the FBI found a mask that belonged to the serial killer who killed 7 people during a costume party on Halloween night in 1972.The killer was never found. And along with the mask, the FBI found a video that tells the true story of that massacre.

programme.title: 1313 Frankenqueen
programme.desc: A group of five young men agree to act as "test subjects" for plastic surgeon Victoria Franks. But their getaway at Victoria's lavish Malibu mansion turns deadly, as their mad scientist hostess implements a nefarious and homicidal agenda.

programme.title: Encargo
programme.desc: When Willi receives a wrong call asking for a weird errand to do, he decides to follow his friend José Manuel advice and take it. That decision changes his life forever after he becomes entangled in a web of mob bosses, kidnappings and robberies.

programme.title: Las Caras Del Diablo
programme.desc: Pedro Ramirez is a junior detective obsessed with the murder of a minor. Three years after the crime, her daughter Sarah is kidnapped in very similar circumstances, starting a unstoppable manhunt to capture the criminal.
